ValidationRule.description: If product is Trailer Track 210 then software/portal picklist must have some value
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (RecordTypeId = '01250000000QoXV' || RecordTypeId ='01250000000DiWm' || RecordTypeId ='01250000000DiWq' || RecordTypeId = '01250000000DiWr' )&&ISPICKVAL( Product__c , 'Trailer Tracks 210') && ISPICKVAL(Software__c , '')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Software/Portal must have some value if product selected is 'Trailer Track 210'
